title: Why are people obsessed with the Viking Age? - Quora

response.answer_text: Original Question:"Why are people obsessed with the Viking Age?" A perceived lack of consequences. When people from the Viking age are presented on TV, they are usually doing things that nobody would get away with today. The irony is that when "Vikings" were at home, they were often just farmers and craftsmen who were living under some surprisingly restrictive laws (for their time) and would have been heavily penalised for that sort of behaviour if they tried it in their home countries.
